content.text: oktoPUS is the institutional repository of Jade University Wilhelmshaven/Oldenburg/Elsfleth. It provides all members of the university with the organizational and technical framework for timely electronic publication and storage of research results in accordance with Open Access principles. Its goals are fast worldwide availability, archiving, and permanent citability of publications.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface, except abstracts, is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The publications and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.

submissionPolicy.text: This repository is intended for Open Access publications. Members of Jade University can submit publications in accepted file formats, such as theses, research reports, or presentation slides. Submissions are checked by the University Library and published upon consent.
